baseline_groups.claim_summary: Local tax collectors increase tax compliance compared to central collectors
baseline_groups.notes: Coef=0.017, p<0.001. With stratum FE. Effect = 30-50% increase relative to control mean of ~5.4%.

global_notes: RCT of local vs central tax collection in Kananga, DRC. 60 specs. Highly robust effect. Local collectors increase compliance by 1.7-2.9pp depending on specification.
